raw.description: Version of the raw-site.yml format. Must be '1.0.0'.

profile.description: Profile name under the given project.

base_url.description: Optional base URL to use for serving endpoints (e.g., 'demo', 'prod', etc.)

enabled.description: If false, disables this repo from being served or validated by default.

secrets.description: List of secret names used by this repo (resolved from ~/.raw/config.yml).

adapters.description: List of adapters to include in the project.

package.description: Python package to import (must be installed beforehand).

config.description: Name of the adapter config entry in ~/.raw/config.yml

dbt.description: Controls dbt integration and file paths.

enabled.description: Whether to use dbt in this repo (defaults to true).

models.description: Path to the dbt models directory.

manifest_path.description: Path to dbt's generated manifest.json file (used for validation).

path.description: Path to a Python file to execute at runtime (to define user-defined functions or context).
Path to the DuckDB file for this profile.

drift.description: Profile-specific RAW schema drift detection manifest configuration.

path.description: Path to the RAW drift manifest file (JSON) for this profile.

cloud.description: Settings specific to the SaaS/Cloud deployment behavior.

github.description: Settings related to GitHub integration in cloud mode.

prefix_with_branch_name.description: Whether to prefix endpoint URLs with the current branch name.

skip_prefix_for_branches.description: List of branch names that will not be prefixed (e.g., main, master).

sql_tools.description: Configuration for built-in SQL querying and schema exploration tools.

enabled.description: Whether to enable built-in SQL querying and schema exploration tools (defaults to true).
